thread.title: Let Me Tell You a Story About Watson Analytics and Expert Storybooks
thread.title_full: Let Me Tell You a Story About Watson Analytics and Expert Storybooks

author: Shimmin, Brad
title: Let Me Tell You a Story About Watson Analytics and Expert Storybooks
text: October 14, 2015 Rate this report Analyst Blog IBM wants to tell you a story; actually, it wants its partners to tell you a story using data-driven narratives built on top of IBM Watson Analytics, validated by IBM itself and driven by human domain expertise.
